General.Name: Crookes Brothers Ltd
General.Description: Crookes Brothers Limited, an investment holding company, engages in the agricultural business in South Africa, Eswatini, Zambia, and Mozambique. The company grows sugar cane, bananas, deciduous fruits, and macadamia nuts. It is also involved in the development and sale of industrial, commercial, and residential properties. In addition, the company engages in leasing of buildings, as well as tourism business. The company was founded in 1860 and is headquartered in Umhlanga, South Africa.
General.Address: Ridge 6, 20 Ncondo Place,, Umhlanga, South Africa, 4319
